name: Furrier
description: A craftsman who works with animal furs and pelts; adventurers can purchase warm clothing, commission custom garments, or sell rare animal hides.
atmosphere: The workshop is filled with the rich scent of animal furs and the earthy smell of leather. The sound of tools working on hides and the soft rustle of fur creates a methodical, skilled atmosphere. The air carries the promise of warmth and the essential nature of protection from the elements.
